CustomField.description: ** System Calculated ** Indicates that the registration item is the attendees primary ticket type.
CustomField.formula: IF (OR(EventApi__Attendee__r.EventApi__Ticket_Type__c == EventApi__Ticket_Type__c, EventApi__Ticket_Type__r.EventApi__Event__c != null && EventApi__Schedule_Item__c == null), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** System Calculated ** Indicates that the registration item is the attendees primary ticket type.
CustomField.label: Is Primary
